name: mocha-report-viewer
description: Cli for piping a xunit test directly into your browser

scripts.build:client:script: coffee --bare --output ngapp/ --compile ngapp_src/index.coffee && browserify ngapp/index.js -d -t browserify-ngannotate -t browserify-css -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map index.js.map --output ngapp/index.js.map] -o ngapp/bundle.js
scripts.build:client: npm run build:client:styles && npm run build:client:markup && npm run build:client:script
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch:server -s" "npm run watch:client:styles -s" "npm run watch:client:markup -s" "npm run watch:client:coffee -s" "npm run watch:client:watchify -s"
scripts.watch:client:watchify: watchify ngapp/index.js -d -t browserify-ngannotate -t browserify-css -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map index.js.map --output ngapp/index.js.map] -o ngapp/bundle.js
